note.p: This appendix is an integral part of the IFRS.

dd.p: An operating segment is a component of an entity:

li.p: that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same entity),
whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the entityâ€™s chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance, and
for which discrete financial information is available.
